title: Tiger Woods has all eyes on him.  50 Cent is scared of Acrimony.  He has a funny story about his Talk Show and more!
itunes:title: Tiger Woods has all eyes on him.  50 Cent is scared of Acrimony.  He has a funny story about his Talk Show and more!
description:
Steve puts a couple of people from South Carolina in one of his cars. We also hear stories of Tiger and 50 Cent. Tommy cuts it close like butter and toast with his Prank Nappy Hair. Carla has another Reality Update. For believers only, Steve's Closing Remarks gives you hope if you believe in God.
